SEARCH
Module com.example.softmethproject4
Package com.example.softmethproject4

Class Pizza

java.lang.Object
com.example.softmethproject4.Pizza
All Implemented Interfaces:
Customizable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BBQChicken, BuildYourOwn, Deluxe, Meatzza
public abstract class Pizza extends Object implements Customizable
This class is an implementation of the Customizable interface and defines a Pizza object. A Pizza object will have a Crust object instance variable, a Size object instance variable and a ArrayList of Toppings instance variable. This class also defines a constructor for a Pizza, as well as getter methods and add() and remove() methods.
Author:
Adwait Ganguly, Kennan Guan

    • Pizza

      public Pizza(ArrayList<Topping> toppings, Crust crust, Size size)
      This method is a constructor for a new Pizza object based on the user input of toppings, crust choice, and size choice.
      Parameters:
      toppings - is an ArrayList of Toppings selected by the user on the GUI.
      crust - is a Crust object based on the user selection on the GUI.
      size - is a Size object based on the user selection on the GUI.
